level.heading: Non-appealable orders.
level.text: ยง 25-204 Non-appealable orders. The following are not appealable to the board: 1. An order requiring an unsafe building, staging or structure to be made safe; 2. An order, requirement, decision or determination made with respect to or under the provisions of section 26-127 of the code and article eight of subchapter three of chapter one of title twenty-six of the code.
